biography: Tony Marshall is a British television actor. Born in Manchester in 1964 (some websites erroneously claim 1974) he  is probably best known for his appearance in the BBC drama series Life on Mars and the final episode of its spinoff Ashes to Ashes as the bartender and confidant, Nelson. He also played Rodney's friend Chris Jevon in Only Fools and Horses and played Diesel in all three series of Preston Front. Since 2008, Marshall has played Noel Garcia, the ED receptionist in the long running BBC medical drama series Casualty.
name: Tony Marshall
